languages.text: Органические конечности сервитора бальзамированы неизвестным раствором, позволяющим сохранять гибкость суставов.

traits.locale_text: Органические конечности сервитора бальзамированы неизвестным раствором, позволяющим сохранять гибкость суставов.

languages.text: The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.
languages.original_text: Органические конечности сервитора бальзамированы неизвестным раствором, позволяющим сохранять гибкость суставов.

traits.locale_text: The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.
The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that preserved the joints and kept them flexible.
The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.
The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.
The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.

languages.text: サーヴィターの有機的な手足には、関節を維持して柔軟性を保つための、見慣れない溶液が塗られている。
languages.original_text: The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.

traits.locale_text: サーヴィターの有機的な手足には、関節を維持して柔軟性を保つための、見慣れない溶液が塗られている。

languages.text: Las extremidades orgánicas del servidor fueron embalsamadas con una solución desconocida que ha preservado las articulaciones y su flexibilidad.
languages.original_text: The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.

traits.locale_text: Las extremidades orgánicas del servidor fueron embalsamadas con una solución desconocida que ha preservado las articulaciones y su flexibilidad.

languages.text: 机仆的四肢以某种你从未见过的液体进行了防腐处理，用来保持关节的灵活性。
languages.original_text: The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.

traits.locale_text: 奴工的四肢以某种你从未见过的液体进行了防腐处理，用来保持关节的灵活性。

languages.text: Les membres organiques du servitor ont été embaumés dans une solution inconnue qui lui a permis de conserver des articulations fonctionnelles.
languages.original_text: The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.

traits.locale_text: Les membres organiques du servitor ont été embaumés dans une solution inconnue qui lui a permis de conserver des articulations fonctionnelles.

languages.text: Die organischen Glieder des Servitors wurden mit Hilfe einer unbekannten Lösung balsamiert, welche die Glieder konserviert und biegsam gehalten hat.
languages.original_text: The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.

traits.locale_text: Die organischen Glieder des Servitors wurden mit Hilfe einer unbekannten Lösung balsamiert, welche die Glieder konserviert und biegsam gehalten hat.

languages.text: Hizmetörün organik uzuvları aşina olmadığın bir solüsyonla mumyalandığı için eklemleri muhafaza edilip esnek kalmış.
languages.original_text: The servitor's organic limbs were embalmed with an unfamiliar solution that has preserved the joints and kept them flexible.
